recently_narrative:
1. The most significant operational pattern observed across these article titles is the increasing reliance on AI and automation technologies within the Zendesk ecosystem, coupled with a need to ensure the stability and reliability of these new features as they are rolled out.

2. This means that Zendesk administrators will need to carefully monitor the performance and impact of AI-powered features like intent detection, intelligent triage, and auto-assist procedures, and be prepared to quickly address any service disruptions or degradations that may arise as a result of these new technologies being integrated into the platform.

release_notes.summary:
1. Support added incremental export APIs for custom objects to enable customers to build reports on their custom object data in external reporting tools.

2. AI Agents Advanced released the unified request view and enabled agents to rate their own tickets where they are requestors, but fixed an issue where agents could no longer change a CSAT score for tickets they are not requestors of if they discover a link.

article.title: Release notes through 2025-09-19
article.description:
See our What's New for an overview of what was released last month.This week's release notes include:
Support
AI Agents Advanced
Products with no updates this week
